Articles.Content: When you post a image of your craft or rover It should NOT be clamed as there OWN i just had this expeirence towards my rover

People are bound to have creations similar or even exactly the same as yours. Unless someone has taken your actual .craft file or screenshot that you took yourself and claimed it for their own then they have done nothing wrong.

Thread locked. If I misunderstood what you're saying then please shoot me a PM.

Edited August 14, 2012 by The-Bean
